meanings.definition: The official department that administers and collects duties on imported goods.
meanings.sent1: The customs inspected the packages at the border.
meanings.sent2: In some countries, customs officers wear uniforms.
meanings.sent3: The customs officer joked that he was the 'sheriff of the border'.
meanings.sent4: The customs acted as gatekeepers, allowing only approved items to pass through.
meanings.sent5: The customs office was bustling with activity as shipments arrived.

meanings.definition: Traditions or practices that are commonly accepted or followed within a particular society or group.
meanings.sent1: Celebrating birthdays with cake and candles is a common custom.
meanings.sent2: Respecting elders is a traditional custom in many cultures.
meanings.sent3: The custom of wearing pajamas to work on Fridays made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The custom of exchanging gifts symbolizes goodwill and friendship.
meanings.sent5: The custom of shaking hands originated as a gesture of peace.
